content.html: My heart is broken. Today my brother Scott passed away unexpectedly. He was so young. He had a loving wife, two young kids, and a newborn. It will take a community to get through this, and I will absolutely be asking for everyone's support to help get the family through this.
content.value:
My heart is broken. Today my brother Scott passed away unexpectedly. He was so young. He had a loving wife, two young kids, and a newborn.

It will take a community to get through this, and I will absolutely be asking for everyone's support to help get the family through this.
